select.columns:
'02' , RPAD(TRIM(ctercero.cif), 20,' ') , CASE WHEN cefectos.auxchr4 = '01' THEN 'F' WHEN cefectos.auxchr4 = '07' THEN 'C' WHEN cefectos.auxchr4 = '08' THEN 'D' ELSE ' ' END , RPAD(cefectos.docser, 20,' ') , TO_CHAR(cefectos.fecven, '%Y%m%d') , CASE WHEN cefectos.moneda = 'PEN' THEN '01' WHEN cefectos.moneda = 'USD' THEN '10' ELSE '--' END , ABS(cefectos.impdiv) , CASE WHEN cterbanc.codban = 'PE0011' THEN '0' ELSE '1' END , CASE WHEN cterbanc.codban = 'PE0011' THEN '09' ELSE '99' END ,
CASE WHEN cterbanc.tipcta = 1 THEN '001' WHEN cterbanc.tipcta = 2 THEN '002' ELSE '--' END , CASE WHEN cterbanc.moneda = 'PEN' THEN '01' WHEN cterbanc.moneda = 'USD' THEN '10' ELSE '--' END , CASE WHEN cterbanc.codban = 'PE0011' THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(cterbanc.iban),1,3) ELSE '000' END , CASE WHEN cterbanc.codban = 'PE0011' THEN SUBSTR(cterbanc.iban,4,10) ELSE cterbanc.iban END , CASE WHEN ctercero.ciftyp = 6 THEN 'C' ELSE 'P' END , CASE WHEN ctercero.ciftyp = 1 THEN '01' WHEN ctercero.ciftyp = 4 THEN '03' WHEN ctercero.ciftyp = 6 THEN '02' WHEN ctercero.ciftyp = 7 THEN '05' ELSE '--' END , ctercero.cif , ctercero.nombre , cefectos.impret , ' '
